metadata.name: Christmas postcard 1
metadata.description: Our Christmas and New Year Collection is our first collection, dedicated to Christmas of 2021 and celebrating the New Year entering 2022. It consists of 2022 unique NFT postcards. There are four main characters in this collection: Crypto Santa, Crypto Reindeer, Crypto Snowgirl and Crypto Snowman. Also, 22 of the postcards are super-rare and especially unique, featuring important events of the year 2021.
